parameter.name: DemoConnString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DemoConnString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Server= tcp:ncg40.database.windows.net,1433;Initial Catalog=NCG40;Persist Security Info=False;User ID= msftncg;Password= Welcome@123;MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False;
